meanings.definition: Liebfraumilch: a type of German white wine
meanings.sent1: I tried a glass of Liebfraumilch at the party last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant had a great selection of Liebfraumilch on their wine list.
meanings.sent3: The Liebfraumilch was so delicious, it made me want to learn more about wine.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet and refreshing as a glass of Liebfraumilch on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the Liebfraumilch filled the room, enticing everyone to take a sip.

meanings.definition: Liebfraumilch: to refer to a specific brand or type of wine
meanings.sent1: I always ask for Liebfraumilch when I go to that fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She brought a bottle of Liebfraumilch to the dinner party as a gift.
meanings.sent3: When he said 'pass the Liebfraumilch,' everyone at the table chuckled.
meanings.sent4: Her love for Liebfraumilch was as strong as her love for her favorite book.
meanings.sent5: The label on the Liebfraumilch bottle was so elegant, it caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: Liebfraumilch: a sweet and fruity wine from the Liebfraumilch region of Germany
meanings.sent1: The Liebfraumilch from Germany has a unique taste that I really enjoy.
meanings.sent2: I bought a bottle of Liebfraumilch as a souvenir from my trip to Germany.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of the Liebfraumilch was like a bouquet of fresh flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bubbly and delightful as a glass of Liebfraumilch.
meanings.sent5: The sun setting over the vineyards where Liebfraumilch is made was a breathtaking sight.
